name: NBTListHelper
description: The NBTListHelper class is a specialized helper for handling NBT list tags in JSMacros. It provides array-like access to NBT list data structures.
overview: The NBTListHelper class provides index-based access to list elements with type information, UUID detection and conversion for int arrays, list length and element type querying, and support for multiple NBT list types (lists, byte arrays, int arrays, long arrays). It integrates with other NBT helper classes for nested data access. NBT list tags are extensively used throughout Minecraft for storing ordered collections of data, including item enchantments, entity positions, block inventories, custom patterns, and various other game mechanics.

methods.name: isPossiblyUUID
methods.description: Checks if this list could represent a UUID based on its type and size.

methods.name: asUUID
methods.description: Converts this list to a UUID if it matches the UUID format.

methods.name: length
methods.description: Returns the number of elements in this list.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves the element at the specified index as an NBTElementHelper.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the element to retrieve

methods.name: getHeldType
methods.description: Returns the NBT type ID of elements in this list.
